onRebind(Intent) - Method in class com.example.currencyrates.CurrencyRatesService
Called when new clients have connected to the service, after it had previously been notified that all had disconnected in its CurrencyRatesService.onUnbind(android.content.Intent).

Called after ScrollingActivity.onCreate(android.os.Bundle) — or after Activity.onRestart() when the activity had been stopped, but is now again being displayed to the user.
